data.description:
## Problem
Dashboard shows 0 edges and 100% orphan nodes, but 16 edge files exist in .got/entities/

## Root Cause
In scripts/got_utils.py line 1295, _build_graph_from_store() tries:
  edge_type=EdgeType[edge_type_str]

Edge types in storage: JUSTIFIES (2), PART_OF (14)
EdgeType enum in cortical/reasoning/graph_of_thought.py does NOT have these types.
KeyError is caught silently at line 1300, edges are not loaded.

## Solution Options
1. Add JUSTIFIES and PART_OF to EdgeType enum in cortical/reasoning/graph_of_thought.py
2. Use a fallback edge type when unknown (e.g., RELATED_TO or custom)
3. Store edge_type as string instead of enum

## Files to Modify
- cortical/reasoning/graph_of_thought.py: Add missing EdgeType values
- scripts/got_utils.py line 1291-1298: Add proper fallback handling

## Test Command
python -c "from scripts.got_utils import TransactionalGoTAdapter; a=TransactionalGoTAdapter('.got'); print(len(a.graph.edges))"
# Should return 16 after fix, currently returns 0
data.title: Fix EdgeType enum missing JUSTIFIES and PART_OF
